description: This file appears to be a BitBake recipe or include file for building the Boost libraries within a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build system. It defines configuration variables, dependencies, build instructions, and packaging details for Boost libraries, including optional features and custom build commands.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the Boost build system by setting up environment variables, copying configuration files, and preparing the build environment.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Runs the Boost build engine (b2) with specified options to compile the libraries.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled Boost libraries and creates necessary symbolic links and CMake files.
